mapper.insert: insert into forumpost( POSTID , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITEDATE , BOARDID , USERID , POSTWRITER , count ) VALUES ( forumpost_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writeDate}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, #{postWriter}, 0 )
mapper.select: select commentId, commentContent, commentWriteDate, commentWriter, postId, userId from ForumPostReview where postId = #{postId}
mapper.insert: insert into forumpostreview( commentId, postId, userId, commentContent, commentWriter, commentWriteDate ) VALUES ( forumpost_seq.nextval, #{postId}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentWriteDate} )
